content: Give your outfit an out of this world touch by accenting it with this galaxy scarf. This infinity loop scarf is made from Chiffon fabric and comes printed with a colorful and vivid image of our majestic universe over its entire surface.

Keep your future paleontologist warm this winter with this stylish children’s dinosaur hoodie. This felt hoodie provides an ultra comfortable fit and comes adorned with little fleece dinosaur spikes all along the back and hood.

Bring one of the galaxy’s most powerful Jedi masters into your home by placing this life size Yoda statue on display. Handmade from urethane, it comes intricately designed and accented to achieve an incredible life like appearance.

Keep your thick and brawny mane looking as majestic as ever using this beard oil conditioner. Ideal for any skin and hair type, this all natural oil mimics your skin’s natural moisturizers and strengthens hair while giving the beard a soft feel and subtle shine.

Create an inviting atmosphere for guests by setting the mood with this rotten fart scented candle. Appropriately named “Pulled My Finger”, the moment you light this soy candle it will to release a putrid stench that will burn for forty hours.

Fire extinguishers be damned, when hard times come this “In Case Of Emergency” box is what you’ll want at hand. This 5″ x 7″ frame can be filled with your choice of sweets like chocolaty M&Ms you can liberate when your sugar levels get dangerously low.

Improve your home’s appearance without breaking the bank by crafting your own soy candles using this kit. Each order includes lantern wicks, a thermometer, wax, and your choice of delightful fragrances like lavender or monkey farts.

Show off your love for the sea in a fashionable way by toting your stuff inside this octopus felt bag. Handmade from felt and cotton, this eye-catching piece features a spacious interior accessible via a zipper and comes adorned with squirmy tentacles along the base.

Indulge in some holiday sweets without breaking your diet by enjoying this sugar free hot chocolate mix. Made with stevia, it brings all the richness of a normal cup of cocoa and is available in delectable flavors like vanilla bean, dark chocolate, and peppermint stick.

Confuse and delight your taste buds with a combination of sweet and tangy when you bite into one of these chocolate covered pretzel rods. Each order includes a set of a dozen yummy rods, all drenched in rich chocolate and topped off with sprinkles.

Animate your kid’s bedroom with some quaint ambient lighting provided by this LED LEGO head lamp. Made from polypropelene, it is fitted with a 9W LED bulb that emits a warm yellow glow that’s as inviting as its joyful smile.

Turn snack time into play time by indulging in some of these sweet LEGO candies. They come in half pound packs with 65 multicolored pieces that can be used as toppings for desserts or simply enjoyed by themselves as candy.

Become a living embodiment of the Dragonborn by slipping into this Skyrim theatrical quality cosplay outfit. It’s styled with real leather and fur to achieve maximum authenticity and features plastic metal accents to facilitate easier movement.

Give a whole new meaning to the term “granny panties” when you slip into one of these Golden Girls panties. Each undergarment provides an ultra comfy fit and comes emblazoned with a portrait of each Golden Girl right over the front.

Make any birthday celebration a little bit sweeter by topping off the delicious cake using these cupcake candles. Ideal for anyone with a sweet-tooth, these soy wax candles come in a range of pastel colors and feature delightfully fruity scents.

Your new favorite droid is jumping off the big screen to keep you hydrated in the form of this BB-8 cup. Sold exclusively at Disney theme parks, the plastic cup comes designed like the new BB-8 from The Force Awakens.

Show your pride for the greatest class to ever graduate – you know, the one that brought down the Death Star – from the prestigious Jedi Academy with this class of 1977 ring. Cast in .925 silver, this finely crafted piece proudly displays the Jedi logo on the top and sides.

Jeff Goldblum – accomplished mathematician, world-renowned computer virus writer, and all around heartthrob – when he’s not tantalizing your loins he’s keeping your coffee piping hot thanks to his Adonis-like physique grazing the exterior of this ceramic mug.

Keep your dog off your bed without the guilt of having them sleep on the floor by using this king bed with a doggy insert. The robust all wood frame houses an enormous king bed in addition to a sizable 23 inch insert on the side big enough for Rex to rest in.

Give your quaint Christmas tree an out of this world touch with these Star Wars ornaments. The glass ornaments come in a set of six and are hand painted to resemble some of the film series’s most iconic characters like Darth Vader, Chewbacca, and C-3PO.

Fend off the cold in the most comfortable way imaginable by wrapping yourself up in this super chunky hand knit blanket. Handmade from 23 microns merino wool, it’s available in a range of vibrant colors and is large enough to wrap around your entire body.

Summon one of the most feared creatures on the planet to life by slipping inside this Cthulhu onesie. It’s made from ultra soft fleece and features a fully decorated hoodie complete with red eyes, ears, and tentacles.

titleEN: The Reason You Drink Wine Label
content: Teachers have a hard job, and your little troublemaker isn’t making it any easier – so give them a wine bottle wrapped with this label saying “our child might be the reason you drink. So enjoy this bottle on us!” alongside a personalized picture of your little hellspawn.

Get into the holiday spirit every time you head out with this eye-catching Christmas ornament purse. The color of the Christmas ball ornament can be customized and the design features a discreet zipper in the back with ample room for storage.

Help maintain order in your humble abode by keeping your stuff stored inside this movable jewelry trays organizer. Handcrafted from oak and iron, the design allows you to rotate the trays to your liking – making them ideal for any room in your home.

Increase your hizzle’s street cred by laying out this Fo Shizzle doormat. Perfect for the trap house, it’s made from durable eco-friendly materials and is decorated with a fade-resistant paint that makes it ideal for outdoor use.

Teach someone who’s been naughty a lesson by giving them this bag of coal soap as a gift. This vegan-approved glycerin soap features a realistic coal appearance, a delightful firewood fragrance, and comes in a stamped muslin bag.

Turn insults into beautiful works of art by unleashing your creativity on this swear words coloring book. Each page features a lovely hand drawn rendition of different curse words such as “fuck it”, “cunt”, “dick”, or “bollocks” that you can bring to life with color.

Give any room a distinguished appearance by keeping your possessions organized on these geometric shelves. Hand crafted from fine wood, the shelves sport a minimalist honeycomb pattern with spaces big enough to store movies, books, and picture frames.

Protect your furniture from nasty water rings in true superhero fashion using this Justice League steel coaster set. Each coaster displays a distinct hero emblem and comes fitted with a smooth felt backing to prevent damage to your furniture.

Set your sleek laptop apart from the rest by giving it some old school flair using this retro Apple MacBook sticker. The decal applies in a snap and features a translucent design that creates a cool stained glass glowing effect when the icon lights up.

Bring a piece of your favorite space epic into your home by decorating it with this R2-D2 Tatooine terrarium. The terrarium is compact enough to fit on any desktop and depicts your favorite scrappy droid exploring the arid landscapes of Tatooine.

Turn bedtime into your kids’ favorite time of the day by moving them into this clubhouse bunk bed. It features an extremely sturdy frame and comes with accents like built-in shelves, a rope window, and a side ladder for easy access to the top bunk/clubhouse.

Give your budding photography studio a little personality with this camera lens stool. This novelty stool features a sturdy wood frame meticulously designed to resemble a gigantic camera lens that stands nearly twenty one inches tall.

Give your bedroom some vintage appeal by lighting up the place using this Nixie tube clock. Made of socketed IN-12 tubes and two IN-17 tubes, this stylish timepiece emits a cool blue glow and includes features such as GPS time control and a functional alarm.

Unleash your little tike’s inner shadow warrior by dressing him up in this kid’s ninja costume. Available in either a stealth black or deep blue hue, this costume is made from a soft cotton jersey that provides a comfortable fit that won’t hinder movement.

Get frisky by swapping out your plain jane underwear for these sexy kitty panties. They’re made out of fine knitwear to provide a comfortable fit that won’t restrict movement and come with an adorable pussycat printed right over the hoo-ha region.

Perfect your ranged warfare skills during your downtime with this micro BB crossbow. This tiny handmade weapon is fully functional and can easily shoot anything from bb’s to small headless nails or even matches.

Relive some of your favorite heroes’ greatest adventures by going through the pages of these vintage comic books. The set includes a varied assortment of comics ranging from Conan The Barbarian to the Fantastic Four – all in great condition.

Make your gameroom pop by bringing an iconic bad guy to life with this light up Doom Cacodemon sculpture. Standing at a foot tall, it features exquisite detailing and 27 internal LEDs that make this monster looking incredibly realistic.

titleEN: Up House Hanging Glass Terrarium Kit
content: Give your child’s room a fun, whimsical touch with this quaint little “Up” house hanging glass terrarium kit. Once assembled, you’re left with a miniature yet detailed version of the iconic “Up” house being lifted into the air by dozens of colorful balloons.

Make your childhood nightmares a reality by bringing this Slappy The Dummy replica home. Masterfully handmade from PVC and resin, it’s painted and dressed to look exactly like the iconic demented dummy.

Keep your feet nice and toasty while you lounge around the house by sticking them into these knitted shark slippers. They’re made entirely from soft yarn and designed to look like hungry sharks are ferociously devouring your legs.

Keep your little Imperial in training looking stellar as he sleeps in his crib by dressing him up in this Star Wars Stormpooper baby onesie. The onesie is made from 100% cotton for a superb fit and makes an ideal gift for anyone who’s a fan of the film series.

Breathe new life into your patio’s nighttime landscape using this rainbow kaleidoscope solar path light. The lamp is designed with a spiked bottom for easy installation and is hand painted so that it glows in a multitude of vibrant colors when turned on.

Make your young Padawan’s science fiction themed birthday one to remember with help from these Star Wars lightsaber napkin rings. By downloading a simple PDF file, you’ll be able to print out your own disposable rings, styled like lightsaber hilts.

Just one bite of these incredible unicorn rainbow poop cookies is all it takes to get hooked on this magical fecal matter. Baked with love and humor, these multicolored sugar cookies are handmade and are available in batches of 3, 6, or 12.

Celebrate what really matters in life – the little things – with some humor using these grown-up award ribbons. These satin ribbons are inscribed with comical achievements such as “adulting honorable mention” and “I put on pants today”.

Need blackmail material for your offspring’s rebellious teenage years? Simply dress your whole family up in these matching striped Christmas pajamas and you’ll have the ultimate weapon in your back pocket should your kids ever try to act too cool in front of their friends.

Take home the gold at the next ugly Christmas sweater contest by wearing this holiday themed abomination of fashion. This Frankenstein of a sweater comes littered with everything ranging from little Christmas trees to Santa’s severed head.

Put this year’s Comic-Con outfit over the top by finishing it off with this Legend of Zelda Hylian shield. The shield is expertly crafted by hand from resin and filled with foam to keep it light – making it an ideal accessory for cosplay.

Be the envy of all your fellow geeky collectors by acquiring this Darth Vader melted helmet replica. This 3D printed helmet is smoothed over and then cast in a solid coat of resin to give the helmet a more realistic weight and appearance.

Fill your little ones with hope and joy this Christmas by leaving one of these personalized gift sacks from Santa under the tree. Each bag is customized with your child’s name and is decorated with realistic postal stamps to keep your deceitful web of lies alive.

Quench your thirst like a true gamer by chugging down some refreshing Nuka Cola Quantum. Each bottle is handmade with extraordinary attention to detail, and it comes filled with a drinkable liquid that’s totally not radioactive. Probably.

Help your little ones partake in decorating the tree without having your expensive ornaments broken by having them decorate this felt Christmas tree instead. This little green tree stands three feet tall and comes with bright colorful ornaments.

Channel the power of the Dark Side while driving by outfitting your ride with this Death Star shift knob. Cast in solid resin, it’s carefully hand painted, topped off with a clear coat for added protection, and can be used as a beer tap handle as well.

Turn your favorite wines into celebratory drinks with help from these marriage milestone wine labels. These custom labels can be fitted over any bottle to help you commemorate special events like your “first big purchase” or “first fight”.

Rock the holiday party just like the Champagne Papi himself by showing up dressed in this Drake Hotline Bling ugly Christmas sweater. It’s the perfect garment whether you’re looking to stay warm or trying to break it down like Drizzy on the dance floor.

Prolong the lifespan of your Kindle by protecting it with this kindle book cover. This handmade cover is meticulously crafted to resemble a beautiful hardcover book, complete with first class illustrations and intricate designs.

Give your beer cap collection a serious boost by purchasing this beer bottle cap variety pack. Each pack comes with an assortment of distinct brews from all over and of every shade, making them ideal to have on display in your man cave or bar.

Set your gaming area apart form the rest by decorating it with this Legend Of Zelda Kokiri Emerald. Straight from the Kokiri forest, this dazzling gem features an eye catching green glass diamond at the center surrounded by intricately decorated roots.

It’s dangerous to get locked out – take one of these Legend Of Zelda keychains off this hanger! The innovative design allows you to hang your wooden sword or shield keychain on the board so they’re always at hand.

Brush off the frigid weather like a real man by strapping on this crochet beard and mustache. This fluffy beard envelops your face in a soft and warm embrace that keeps you comfy while giving you a distinguished silver fox appearance.

Experience a new level of clean – the kind that only magical fecal matter can provide – by showering with some unicorn poop soap. Just as you’d expect, their multicolored droppings look like a wondrous rainbow and feature a delightful fruity scent.

Brighten up your pad by adding a festive touch to it using this pinata donkey rug. This handmade colorful burrito is crafted from felt, cotton, and fiberill and measures approximately three feet long so you can fit it in virtually any room in your home.

Concoct a perfect half and half by pouring your brews into this dual chamber beer glass. The ingenious design of this hand blown glass features two independent chambers so your brews remain separate until you’re ready to drink.

Keep your manly hooks clean without feeling emasculated by using this rough hand scrub for men. Handmade from natural ingredients, this organic scrub softens and exfoliates the skin without leaving behind a feminine scent.

Keep your eye on the ball – of yarn – all year round with the business cats calendar. Purrrfect for feline friendly office environments – the calendar helps you stay organized while displaying some immaculately dressed kitties in their best business attire.

You don’t need to be an expert at using the Force to wield these lightsaber dildos like a true Jedi Master-bator. With items like a Groot dildo, Green Lantern cock ring, and Jon’s dildo sword, these geeky sex toys are guaranteed to scratch your kinky itch.

Brighten up your otherwise gloomy workdays by celebrating life’s little victories using these “Everyday Achievement” certificates. Each certificate comes with strategically placed blank spaces so you can customize everything from the occasion to the recipient.

Sample the finest herbs this planet has to offer with this customizable tea sampler pack. You’ll be able to sample from over fifty different teas including Dianhong Gong Fu, Roasted Cinnamon Vanilla, and Classic Earl Grey.

Melt the faces off your audience with more than just your amazing shredding skills by playing with this molten lava guitar. You’ll sizzle on stage as the lava glows bright orange while it slides down the surface of your one of a kind musical instrument.

titleEN: Harry Potter Book Of Spells Kindle Case
content: Give your high-tech device a magical makeover by protecting it using this Harry Potter book of spells kindle case. It comes inscribed with an intricate golden design against a sea of purple so your kindle looks like an ancient text.

Indulge in some savory looking junk food without worrying about the calories by staying warm with this cheeseburger crochet beanie. Each beanie comes stuffed with a delicious patty topped with cheese, lettuce, and tomato between two plump buns.

Keep all your mobile devices fully juiced and always at hand by storing them inside this gentleman’s charging station. This custom built station comes with three different USB ports and features enough additional room to store all your gear like your keys and watches.

Stave off the cold by staying incredibly warm wrapped up inside this super chunky knit blanket. The blanket is handmade from all natural sheep’s wool using a giant knit stitch that measures approximately two inches thick and is available in three distinct sizes.

Transform your little princess into a beautiful sea creature by snuggling up with this mermaid tail blanket. Each blanket is handmade from ultra soft acrylic and is shaped into a cocoon to keep the feet extra warm and snug.

Experience a new level of clean by exfoliating your body using this savory fluffy whipped soap sugar scrub. The fine sugar crystals in this scrub provide mild exfoliation while still being gentle enough to rub throughout your entire body.

Revitalize your wardrobe by sporting the latest in Jurassic fashion using this men’s dinosaur hoodie. This wool blend hand crocheted hoodie transforms your puny human head into a cool dino skull – complete with olive green spikes.

Make your living room the place to socialize while pretending to work on your novel by giving it a coffee shop vibe using this Starbucks mocha scented candle. This soy candle features a sultry and chocolaty aroma that’ll fill up your entire home.

Give your home bar a unique touch that’s reflective of your love of alcohol by using these beer bottle wine glasses. Ideal for collectors and beer enthusiasts alike, each glass is meticulously built using a recycled glass bottle.

Prolong your survival in the wretched post apocalyptic wastelands by equipping yourself with this Fallout gas mask. This two piece fiber glass and resin mask features intricate detailing such as gas canisters and integrated light pods.

Make the holidays one to remember by topping off your fantastic feast with these Thanksgiving themed cookies. Made from all natural ingredients, each tasty vanilla cookie comes shaped like fun turkeys, pumpkins, and fall themed leaves.

Who says only wine drinkers get to have all the fun of sniffing before drinking? Now you too can experience the rich full bodied aroma from your fancy imported beer by using this unique beer glass that concentrates the volatiles and aromatics of your booze.

Honor your glory days of arcade gaming with this recycled arcade coin drop belt buckle. This wearable piece will remind you of a simpler time when all games were designed intentionally difficult so you’d dump dozens of quarters in just to beat a single level.

Show guests what a loving and sociable person you are by greeting them with this “keister off my property” doormat. Handmade from eco-friendly materials, this sturdy doormat’s frank and comical message is sure to get a laugh from everyone that comes to visit.

Keep the bulk in your pockets to a minimum by saving space using this wallet iPhone case. Handmade from genuine leather, this distinguished case features enough room for up to eight credit cards and can be personalized with a monogram.

Place your origami skills to the test by making yourself one of these fun DIY animal paper masks. You simply cut out the pieces and follow the included instructions to assemble yourself a vibrant and original mask such as an octopus, pig, fish, or even a praying mantis.

Ensure your sweetheart stays by your side no matter where you go by carrying your own personalized couples keychain. Simply send in a few pictures, and two polymer clay pint sized counterparts resembling the two of you right down to the outfit will be yours.

Turn your kid’s paper drawings into cute and cuddly plush dolls using this specialized service from Budsies. You simply email a picture of your child’s artwork and in a few short weeks you’ll have a customized plushie delivered right to your doorstep.

titleEN: Wake And Bake Coffee Pipe Mug
content: Start your day off on a high note using the wake and bake coffee pipe mug. Functional as both a pipe and a coffee mug, it incorporates a discreet bowl at the base so you can enjoy a nice toke while you sip your cup of Joe.

Spread the news of your upcoming addition to the family with some humor by using these “bun in the oven” pregnancy announcement boxes. Each bun comes with a custom note, making them ideal for baby shower invitations and gender reveal parties.

Obliterate germs and foul odors as if they were the planet of Alderaan by harnessing the power of the Death Star soap. Inspired by the Empire’s most destructive weapon, this spherical Shea butter soap makes an ideal gift for any fan of the classic film series.

Protect your smartphone from the dangers of the post apocalyptic wasteland using this 3D printed Pip-Boy Mark IV. This fully assembled unit can be customized to fit a variety of phone sizes, so you can use your iPhone as a real world personal information processor.

Cement the special bond you share with your BFF by signing this realistic best friend contract with them. It comes filled with stipulations designed to ensure both of you remain by each other’s sides through thick and thin.

Bring sexy back this holiday season by wearing one of these titillating ugly Christmas sweaters. The sweater’s risque design leaves a boobie exposed, so that you can decorate it like a cute reindeer – complete with antlers, eyes and a big red nose pasty.

Fool your muggle children into thinking they’ve got a bright future in the world of wizardry using this Hogwarts acceptance letter gift box. The box comes packed with all kinds of goodies from an official acceptance letter to a hand crafted Marauder’s map.

Keep boredom at bay while you let your creativity flow by working on this downloadable adult coloring book. Each page features a unique and marvelously intricate design that you can bring to life using your arsenal of color pencils and markers.

Set up a functional knife rack almost anywhere in your kitchen using these magnetic stickers. The set includes three distinct sizes which set up in seconds to provide a space saving and aesthetically pleasing way to store your cutlery.

Celebrate the true heroes of the office – the shit shiners – for their outstanding efforts by bestowing upon them this turd polishing award ribbon. Day in and day out, these unsung warriors of the workplace somehow make TPS report meetings enjoyable.
